attributes.action: Help the Tamil people in Srilanka by providing food, clothes and shelter (North & East part of Srilanka) and help them gain their country back
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We kindly request you to help our Tamil people in Srilanka by providing Food, Clothes and Shelter. Everyday Tamil people are suffering because of the government of Srilanka Bombing, attacking, raping, Hanging, and killing the Tamils, in return to fight for the Tamils and help the Tamils, LTTE was formed. They are not terrorist they are giving up their lives to fight for the Tamils against the Sinhalese Government. The Sinhalese government are misusing their power as an End result Tamils population are decreasing in Srilanka. Tamil school girls are raped and killed, Parents killed or left to be hung in front of their children & etc by the Sinhalese Government. Who is there to talk for our Tamil people and who is there to listen and help our Tamils, now we believe you are here to Help our Tamil people and listen to our problems and provide a great support. 
All we are asking is please help our Tamil people gain their country back. Please help them by providing Food, Clothes and Shelter to our Tamil people in the North and East of Srilanka. Once we get our country back we don't mind Sinhalese people living there we Just want a fair and a peaceful country.
Thank-you Very much

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
